name: Dodge This (h1G_hadezbladez)
description:
Help the red dodge the blue! Share your score, thoughts and other crazy pattern that will make my games harder or easier on comments

Controls : 

  1. inGame >> A, D buttons and left, right arrow button to dodge
  2. inGameOver >> Enter to go menu state, R to retry
  3. inMenu >> left and right control volume, up and down control game modes
  4. InSplashScreen >> Do i need to explain you more to press button?

you can check it out more unpolished of my games its the same game in there >> https://www.newgrounds.com/portal/view/722332

Will i make a game for windows version? (if someone support my work i will)
